alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 7:09PM CDT until August 10 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Ericson, or 16 miles east of Burwell, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ericson and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 137. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
